preference.name: EngChange Revision_DefaultChildProperties
preference.preference_description: Requires the following relation names. The final setting (release_status_list) is required to display the current status in My Teamcenter. Valid Values: IMAN_master_form_rev IMAN_specification IMAN_requirement IMAN_manifestation IMAN_reference affected_items solution_items problem_items reference_items addressed_by release_status_list
